name: Color Combo Challenge
description:
Wanna be part of the most competitive and thrilling mobile game of the year? Look no further!
Merge as many color blocks as you can until the timer ends, create 50s to maximize your scoring potential!
Challenge your friends and merge your way to the top of the global leaderboards in this thrilling new approach to match-3 gaming!

If you love combining colors and numbers to achieve MASSIVE scores, Color Combo Challenge is the game for you! Polish your skills and challenge your friends in this fast paced strategic puzzle game that will keep you coming back for more!

- Easy to learn, difficult to master. Do YOU have what it takes?
- Play against friends and real opponents across the globe!
- Compete for the top rank among friends and on worldwide Skillz leaderboards.
- Play for FREE, or compete with cash if you're up to the challenge!*

Match three or more squares of the same color to combine them, and try to make as many 50s as you can before time runs out! The player with the most high-value squares at the end of the game wins! With an endless supply of new squares falling in from the top, the only obstacle to success is your own speed and a winning strategy! Can you become the greatest player that Color Combo Challenge has ever seen?

Join the Skillz community to save your progress and make your mark on the leaderboards. Play head-to-head games or in large, multiplayer tournaments for virtual currency or MAJOR CASH PRIZES! Create a Skillz account to save your progress and access your profile from any Skillz-enabled game!

*Note: Cash tournaments are available in about 75% of the world. Cash tournaments are not enabled in the following states: AZ, AR, CT, DE, FL, IL, LA, MD, MT, SC, SD, and TN. If you don't live in a cash-enabled region, you can still play for fun with our virtual currency.

If you have any questions about the Skillz system or cash tournaments please contact: support@skillz.com
